name: Dark Angels: Masquerade of Shadows
description: Save mankind from demonic forces in this thrilling hidden object adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.5 GHz Core 2 Duo Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
